name: Demon puppies
description:
One week turned one day/night prototype with some optimization. Avoid the puppies, find the light.                                                                                                                             

You need to avoid being overwhelmed by the puppies and  run to a light spot where it's safe. The Idea was to make puppies scary with use of sound and amount.

Please inform me if the game don't work on your computer.  Particularly if nothing happens, or you never get a game over screen if you are standing still outside of a safe area.
